Text explanation of the Demo: This is a text generator using Deep Neural Networks. You will input a small initial text (min 6 words long) and it will start writing based on it.
disclaimer about accuracy: Its accuracy is rapidly improving, as there are many new techniques integrated in the next version.
language hint: For Text Generation in Spanish, click on the top-right flag.
placeholder: Jack Bauer (born February 2, 1973) is a federal agent
